title: YASUO BUG DOUBLE AA BEFORE ULT ANIMATION

embed.description: League of Legends (LOL) Season 6 Patch 6.17. Yasuo's win rate recently has increased significantly in both the top lane and mid lane. A new yasuo bug has been found after the recent fixes of some old bugs. This unlike the old bugs gives Yasuo a huge advantage rather than disadvantage.

body:
DISABLE {{champion:157}}  BEFORE ITS TO LATE ,U NEED TO FIX IT ,EVERYONE PLAYS YASUO BCS OF THIS BUG ,PLAYED 22 GAMES TODAY ALL YASUO IN GAME ,THIS IS FRUSTRATING, AND GAME UNBALANCING {{summoner:21}} {{summoner:21}} {{summoner:21}} .
SO BASICALLY ,BEFORE ANIMATION ULT HE AA CRITS 200-1000 DEPENDS ON LEVEL, 2 TIMES .
IF U DONT DO IT FAST U WILL NEED TO NERF HIS  BASE KIT LATER AND THAT IS A DISASTER.

replies.body: Yeah there should be a rework of all these champions. {{champion:22}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:266}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:150}} {{champion:420}} {{champion:64}} Any 2 kills early game will consider these champions as fed.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=ULZzx2Fc,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-01T20:04:38.094+0000)
>
> This is nothing new.

This is new it started happening this patch
its not a bug, he previously had his second auto delayed due to a bug that was just patched. this is the way he was intended to be, but now seeing as hes so strong now, they will be nerfing him.
Nobody can take you for real because of those caps...
